column5: Has any member know the contact information for Sandercock Cottage in Rice Lake?  Thanks in advance!

Not sure on their phone number but if it is lodging you are looking for, you can't beat this price anywhere on Rice Lake!  Ridge view cottages is offering accommodations at 25.00 per person per night. They would prefer a 2 night minimum though.  Here is their website and email address:  http://www.ridgeviewcottages.ca/ [emailÂ protected]
Thanks for your information but we've been renting cottage from Sandercock and it bring lots of good memories to us.Therefore this year we want to come back again!  Thanks again!
Thanks again for the info but this is the old phone number which is disconnected!

They shut down and were bought recently.  Forum member DiggyJmight know more details.  I suggest sending him a PM or contacting him on the Rice Lake Fishing Board.  It might also be on the Rice Lake Tourist board under a new name.  I don't know where the old resort was located, so cannot help you there.  Good luck.
